text:
Has anyone tried using `block` and `extends` with the new <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/specify-drag-and-drop-areas-in-a-custom-email-template|drag and drop email template beta>?

I'm wanting to create a common base layout for these new templates. But I can't get a template extending the base template to save. Weirdly, it saves when I set "isAvailableForNewContent" to `false` . If I remove the `dnd_area`, it also begins to save.
Using a `global_partial` also results in the same thing. "There was a problem publishing your template."
I have been trying to get my HubSpot email webhook to work, but the email webhook I kept receiving seems not to come with the email body text. Please what could be the cause?
